reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding! Does the job perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: Intended Uses" Errands around town and for long walks. Great size and pocket organization for all the typical go-withs: keys, phone, mask, snack bar, meds etc. This bag replaces a "free gift" from an enviro organization. That "free gift" light canvas bag was OK when hanging from my shoulder, but turned into a formless blob when I put it on a desk or table. The zippers were tiny and tasfully the same canvas color. So I love how this new bag has tastfully medium size zipper tabs - just the right size! Shiny and easy to see! The PU Leather bag is nice and soft but still plenty firm enough to keep its shape. When I put it on a table, it keeps its shape - it is not a blob. I put it on its back. I call the part with the slant zipper the front. It is impossible to get confused between the front and back of bag, top or bottom. I confess I am now legally blind, but used to have great vision. I think for any type of vision, this bag would be easy to organize and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and functions well.
reviews.reviewText: The looks of the leather is nice; I get a lot of compliments. The compartmentalization with numerous sections and a couple of interior sections in the main section works very well for great organization. Larger IPhone fits nicely in the outside pocket which has a magnet hold shut that works very well. And there are a couple of zippered sections. Sturdy with nice, sturdy shoulder strap and also a hand carry handle at top of the bag. Zippers all work well. Good material and construction, looks very expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Looking
reviews.reviewText: This bag is just the right size for me; not truly spacious but certainly adequate. The pocket on the back is great for a card case/tickets. The larger opening on the lower front easily holds my phone, a checkbookand pen. A smaller pocket under the front flap is useful for eye drops & a pill case.The color is great; a light saddle tan-brown.The zippers are a bit temperamental; they work if you handle them with great care. And the fold down flap on the front is not well planned; it must be unsnapped & lifted to gain access to the opening below it.Perhaps not of the highest quality but this reasonably priced bag is very good looking and keeps all the things i need together and easily accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: a great gift my cousin loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well to carry out on the town

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: But same issues as with others not quite big enough to hold what I have to have in it every day!! Needed something a little bigger just didn’t want a full sized backpack just to bulky for what little I do have to place in it but still sturdy and well made for wear and tear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a gem
reviews.reviewText: Bag works wonderfully well. Doesn’t cut into my shoulders. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quickly fell apart
reviews.reviewText: We got this for my son who was traveling out of the country. He loved the size, color, style, how roomie it was, etc....until it started to fall apart within 2-3 weeks of using it. Such a disappointment!
